alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Mainland Hyde; Northern Craven (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 5:38PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Craven, southwestern Hyde and central Beaufort Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 538 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Goose Creek State Park, or near River Road, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Washington, River Road, Belhaven, Sladesville, Ransomville, Pungo, Blounts Creek, Pamlico Beach, Bunyan, Bonnerton, Cox Crossroads, Winsteadville, Core Point, Bayview, Sidney Crossroads, Terra Ceia, Yeatesville, Aurora Ferry Terminal, Goose Creek State Park and Bayview Ferry Terminal. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
